group_1.narration: Once we became Magical Girls,@we went to all sorts of places.
Maybe you're wonderin' why...

group_1.textCenter: I know one thing for sure…
After experiencing a battle with a Witch,@and taking into account what Kyubey said…
We'll have to battle Witches for the rest@of our lives.

group_1.narration: We use up magic when we fight. It'd be no @good if we ran low when battlin' a Witch...@But we can use Grief Seeds to get it back.
Anyway!

group_1.textCenter: Yeah, it'd be really bad if we were to@run out of magic.
Best-case scenario, we feel kinda faint@and weak when our magic is low, right?
So there's no way it'd be good if it ran@out completely...
Soul Gems, huh... I feel like our lives@are pretty dependent on them now...

group_1.narration: So that's why we're always tryin' to beat@Witches. It's priority number one!@We lived in a city outside Kamihama@for a while, lookin' for Witches out there.

group_1.textCenter: There's no telling what will happen@if we run out of magic...
So we can't stop hunting Witches.
Do you understand? If we want to live our@lives to the fullest...

group_1.narration: But Hazuki learned recently that Kamihama@was being overrun with Witches.
And so! For the first time in@forever we headed back!
Back to Kamihama City!

group_1.textLeft: Weird... It doesn't feel like it's been that@long, does it?
We're even going back to the same school.@It's like we're starting all over again.

group_1.textRight: Oh? Should we have gone to a different@school?

group_1.textLeft: No, no, this one's great! I like this uniform@the best!

group_1.textRight: If we went to another school, it's likely we@would see kids from the Azalea House.

group_1.textLeft: It really hasn't been that long since@we left, but it feels like forever...

group_1.narration: Oh, by the way, by the way!@Konoha is super awesome!
She used the money she saved and got@more using something called "stocks"!
Hazuki always cooks for us,@and she does the cleanin', too!
I help out as well!@Just a little bit, though!
I wonder sometimes, are dads and moms@kinda like how Konoha and Hazuki are?

group_1.textRight: Oh, did you draw a picture?
Ayame, what's this supposed to be?
Ah... The one with the really bendy@limbs?

group_1.textLeft: Nooo! There's your eyes, see? And this is@your nose!

group_1.textRight: I see now! What a surreal drawing!

group_1.narration: It was really sad when@we left the Azalea Home.
But I didn't cry, not one bit.
Ya see...@I had Konoha and Hazuki with me!
And we're stickin' together forever!@That's what we always say!
We're gonna hold each other@tight and never, ever let go!
So!
You don't have to worry@about a thing, Director...
